entities.description: This represents the unweighted frequency of responses for each category in the NSDUH survey.
The percentage of responses for each category in the NSDUH survey.
The specific category or code representing types of responses in the NSDUH survey.
The number of valid cases analyzed in the NSDUH survey data file.
The total number of cases in the NSDUH survey.
The average value of the response categories.
The middle value of the response categories.
The most frequently occurring value in the response categories.
The minimum value in the response categories.

relationships.description: Indicates the unweighted frequency of each response category.
Indicates the percentage of total responses for each category.
Relates the survey to the number of valid cases analyzed.
Relates the survey to the total number of cases.
Defines the average value of the response categories.
Defines the middle value of the response categories.
Defines the most frequently occurring value in the response categories.
Defines the minimum value in the response categories.
